Adam method.from sentence: We use the Adam method ( Kingma and Ba , 2014 ) for optimization .

dropout.from sentence: We use dropout with a rate of 0.5 , which is applied to all feedforward connections .

pre-trained 300 - D Glove 840B vectors.from sentence: We use pre-trained 300 - D Glove 840B vectors to initialize our word embeddings .

second.from sentence: The first momentum is set to be 0.9 and the second 0.999 .

batch size.from sentence: The initial learning rate is 0.0004 and the batch size is 32 .

hidden states.from sentence: All hidden states of LSTMs , tree - LSTMs , and word embeddings have 300 dimensions .

Out - of - vocabulary ( OOV ) words.from sentence: Out - of - vocabulary ( OOV ) words are initialized randomly with Gaussian samples .
